title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, there is a discrepancy in the format between the dynamic text item and the data/text item. The dynamic text item displays the datetime in a different format compared to the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create three items.
2. Input 'new Date()' as content for all three items.
3. Save and preview the items.

Expected result: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format for all three items.
Actual result: The datetime values displayed in the dynamic text item are different from the format in the data/text item.
